page_content:
Non-statistical indicator

We have identified the following to be relevant to this indicator - Emergency Management Strategy for Canada: Toward a Resilient 2030.

In 2018, British Columbia adopted the UN Sendai Framework for Disaster Risk Reduction (2015-2030) (Sendai Framework) to align and improve its approach to all phases of emergency management.

Québec adopted the 2014-2024 Québec Emergency Management Policy as well as a National Action Plan, directly inspired by the priority actions of the Hyogo Framework, the predecessor of the Sendai Framework.
